channel.title: Shop Help >.<
channel.description: Well, I am new to using phonescape source, but how do I make it where the items are in the shop? Because I have shop.cfg with the shops in there, and the autospawn.cfg that has the NPC's. And yet, the items don't show up in the shop? Meh O.o help plx? :o

item.title: Shop Help >.<
item.dc:creator: @04rsxs 04rsxs
item.description:
@04rsxs wrote:

You also need to add your new shop in client. java:

Go into client.java and search for

"varrock general store"

You should see a list like this

} else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; //Aubury Magic Shop } else if (NPCID == 522 || NPCID == 523) { //Shop Keeper + Assistant PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 1; //Varrock General Store } else if (NPCID == 526 || NPCID == 527) { //Shop Keeper + Assistant PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 3; //Falador General Store } else if (NPCID == 577) { //Cassie PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 4; //Falador Shield Shop } else if (NPCID == 580) { //Flynn PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 5; //Falador Mace Shop } else if (NPCID == 538) { //Peksa PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 6; //Barbarian Vullage Helmet Shop } else if (NPCID == 546) { //Zaff PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 7; //Varrock Staff Shop } else if (NPCID == 548) { //Thessalia PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 8; //Varrock Rare shop } else if (NPCID == 551 || NPCID == 552) { //Shop Keeper + Assistant PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 9; //Varrock Sword shop } else if (NPCID == 549) { //Horvik PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 10; //Varrock Armor shop } else if (NPCID == 550) { //Lowe PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 11; //Varrock Armor shop } else if (NPCID == 584) { //Heruin PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 12; //Falador Gem Shop } else if (NPCID == 581) { //Wayne PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 13; //Falador Chainmail Shop } else if (NPCID == 585) { //Rommik PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 14; //Rimmington Crafting Shop } else if (NPCID == 531 || NPCID == 530) { //Shop Keeper + Assistant PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 15; //Rimmington General Store } else if (NPCID == 1860) { //Brian PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 16; //Rimmington Archery Shop } else if (NPCID == 557) { //Wydin PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 17; //Port Sarim Food Shop } else if (NPCID == 558) { //Gerrant PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 18; //Port Sarim Fishing Shop } else if (NPCID == 559) { //Brian PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 19; //Port Sarim Battleaxe Shop } else if (NPCID == 556) { //Grum PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 20; //Port Sarim Jewelery Shop } else if (NPCID == 583) { //Betty PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 21; //Port Sarim Magic Shop } else if (NPCID == 520 || NPCID == 521) { //Shop Keeper + Assistant PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 22; //Lumbridge General Store } else if (NPCID == 519) { //Bob PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 23; //Lumbridge Axe Shop } else if (NPCID == 541) { //Zeke PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 24; //Al-Kharid Scimitar Shop } else if (NPCID == 545) { //Dommik PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 25; //Al-Kharid Crafting Shop } else if (NPCID == 524 || NPCID == 525) { //Shop Keeper + Assistant PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 26; //Al-Kharid General Store } else if (NPCID == 542) { //Louie Legs PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 27; //Al-Kharid Legs Shop } else if (NPCID == 544) { //Ranael PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 28; //Al-Kharid Skirt Shop } else if (NPCID == 2621) { //Hur-Koz PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 29; //TzHaar Shop Weapons,Amour } else if (NPCID == 2622) { //Hur-Lek PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 30; //TzHaar Shop Runes } else if (NPCID == 2620) { //Hur-Tel PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 31; //TzHaar Shop General Store } else if (NPCID == 692) { //Throwing shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 32; //Authentic Throwing Weapons } else if (NPCID == 683) { //Bow and arrows PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 33; //Dargaud's Bow and Arrows } else if (NPCID == 682) { //Barrows Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 34; //Barrows Shop } else if (NPCID == 537) { //Scavvo PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 35; //Champion's Rune shop } else if (NPCID == 536) { //Valaine PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 36; //Champion's guild shop } else if (NPCID == 933) { //Legend's Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 37; //Legend's Shop } else if (NPCID == 932) { //Legends General Store PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 38; //Legend's Gen. Store } else if (NPCID == 534) { //God Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 39; //God Shop

At the end of the list add another shop, in the “NPCID == (put your shop NPC ID)”, in the “wanneshop = (shop number from shops.cfg)”.

Make sure the layout is identical to the existing shops so there are no problems when compiling.

Now save, compile, run, and enjoy!

item.title: Shop Help >.<
item.dc:creator: @Rudolph Rudolph
item.description:
@Rudolph wrote:

Eh Pretty Easy:

You know how to make a shop right? And you do know how to use tab, if so then right after the two 2’s put the item ID then the amount and continue. As for your comment about people with 10-15 rep are asses is a lie. Rep doesn’t mean anything nor it ever will mean anything, all it does is destroy Moparscape.

Read full topic

item.title: Shop Help >.<
item.dc:creator: @Rudolph Rudolph
item.description:
@Rudolph wrote:

[quote=“1 dum taco, post:3, topic:107348”][quote author=Eh Pretty Easy link=topic=153650.msg1447136#msg1447136 date=1181258105]
You see the two numbers at the start, it’s 1 or 2. Change them both into 2 and after that there is an item ID then right after is amount of the item. They’re all separated with tabs, get it?
[/quote] i think he means the order they’re in the shop…which is utterly pointless…[/quote]I don’t mean the order of the shops. Re-read it.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 07, 2007, 12:46:05 PM[/size][hr][quote=“egor42, post:4, topic:107348”]Lol… try another npcs… or put your npc in the autospawn under the

//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption
…maybe that should…help …i’m just wondering how…could you get 41 rep…without to know that XD :)[/quote]And how could I get rep without knowing that? Rep doesn’t hardly mean anything, except for helping this community and knowing coding. I said i haven’t used phonescape, I’ve only worked with a few other sources. God you 10-15 rep newbs are asses. Seriously.

[quote=“egor42, post:4, topic:107348”]Lol… try another npcs… or put your npc in the autospawn under the

//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption
…maybe that should…help …i’m just wondering how…could you get 41 rep…without to know that XD :)[/quote]Btw. Autospawn.cfg already has that dumbfuck >.<
